level.heading: EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENTS (ยง 17-4902) An applicant shall furnish proof satisfactory to the Board that the applicantas successfully completed an educational program to practice as a physicianssistant accredited by the Committee on Allied Health Education andccreditation (CAHEA) or its successors by submitting to the Board, with aompleted application, a certified transcript and an official statementerifying graduation from an educational program.
SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 8263, 8264 (December 8, 1989); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 37 DCR 2747, 2751 (May 4, 1990); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 4201 (March 22, 2013).
